summary: Client requested Sarah to start a vision meeting; the PM asked for a project name. Architect, Developer, and QA did not provide input.

actions.task: Start a vision meeting as requested by the client

risks.risk: Key stakeholders (Architect, Developer, QA) did not provide input, risking incomplete requirements and delays.
risks.mitigation: Follow up with Architect, Developer, and QA to solicit input before or during the vision meeting; set a deadline for responses and include missing items on the meeting agenda.
